sentences.en: Thankfully the smoking of cigarettes is on the decline.
sentences.cn: 感谢的是吸烟正在减少。

sentences.en: Thankfully, a solution presented itself to him surprisingly soon.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他意外地很快就找到了答案。

sentences.en: There was a fire in the building, but thankfully no one was hurt.
sentences.cn: 大楼失火了，但幸好没有伤着人。
